Author: Arthur Ashe
Text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

Author: Will Rogers
Text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today

Author: Tracee Ellis Ross
Text: I am learning everyday to let the space between where I am and where I want to be inspire me and not terrify me

Author: Smile Darling
Text: Do more things that make you forget to check your phone

Author: Xan Oku
Text: May the flowers remind us why the rain was so necessary

Author: Unknown
Text: Remember when you so badly wanted what you currently have?

Author: Khanos
Text: There’s a future version of me who’s proud I was strong enough

Author: Unknown
Text: Visualize your highest self, and start showing up as her

Author: Allison Aars
Text: When you finally learn that a person's behavior has more to do with their own internal struggle than it ever did with you... you learn grace

Author: Unknown
Text: You need people in your life that are further along than you, people that have a bigger vision, people that are more experienced, people that are out of your league. You need to be exposed to new levels so that you can go to new levels!

Author: Unknown
Text: Perfectionism is a lie. Start messy.

Author: Unknown
Text: Remember your goal and why you started

Author: Nancy Badillo
Text: It's your story, babe. Feel free to hit 'em with a plot twist whenever you want.

Author: Unknown
Text: They never tell you, the more you bring to the table, the harder it is to find someone to eat with.

Author: Ashley C. Ford
Text: Just because you can take it, doesn't mean you have to. Suffering is not a superpower.

Author: Unknown
Text: If you had a friend who spoke to you the same way you speak to yourself, how long would you allow them to stay your friend?

Author: The Real McCoy
Text: Maybe you're not healing because you're trying to be who you were before the trauma. That person doesn't exist anymore because there's a new you trying to be born. Breathe life into that person.

Author: Cacchi Ricci
Text: It takes a very strong individual to sit with themselves, calm their storms, and heal all of their issues without trying to bring someone else into that chaos. My journey to self-love is just that and yes, I am doing it.

Author: Kate Eckman
Text: Being okay if it happens and okay if it doesn't, is a very powerful place to be.

Author: Unknown
Text: If you feel like everyone hates you, you need to sleep and if you feel like you hate everyone else, you need to eat

Author: Mel Robbins
Text: The same boiling water that softens the potato, hardens the egg. It's about what you're made of, not the circumstances.

Author: Unknown
Text: Replace 'sorry's' with 'thank you's'. Instead of 'sorry I'm late', try 'thank you for waiting on me'. Change your mindset.

Author: Joyce Sunada
Text: If you don't make time for your wellness, you will be forced to make time for your illness

Author: Unknown
Text: Don't let anyone save you for later. Read that again.

Author: Unknown
Text: If you're not noticed, you're still valid. Like, if no one's gonna read it, you should still write it. If no one's gonna see it, you should still do it. If no one's gonna hear you, you should still say it. You're not measured by how people react to you.

Author: Unknown
Text: Just because you don't look like someone who you think is attractive, doesn't mean you aren't attractive. Flowers are pretty but so are christmas lights and they look nothing alike.
